mapper.insert: insert into QXSJB (ID, SZSF, JCDBH, ZDMC, ZDZB, SCSJ, ZDQW, PJQW, ZGQW, JYL, ZDQY, PJQY, ZGQY, HPMQY, PJFS, ZDFS, JDFS, ZDFSFX, JDFSFX, ZXXDSD, PJXDSD, SQY) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{szsf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zdqw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjqw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zgqw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jyl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zdqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zgqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hpmqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zdfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jdfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zdfsfx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jdfsfx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zxxdsd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjxdsd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: update QXSJB set SZSF = #{szsf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCDBH = #{jcdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDMC = #{zdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDZB = #{zdzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCSJ = #{scsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZDQW = #{zdqw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PJQW = #{pjqw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZGQW = #{zgqw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JYL = #{jyl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZDQY = #{zdqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PJQY = #{pjqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZGQY = #{zgqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HPMQY = #{hpmqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PJFS = #{pjfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZDFS = #{zdfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JDFS = #{jdfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZDFSFX = #{zdfsfx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JDFSFX = #{jdfsfx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZXXDSD = #{zxxdsd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PJXDSD = #{pjxdsd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SQY = #{sqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select ID, SZSF, JCDBH, ZDMC, ZDZB, SCSJ, ZDQW, PJQW, ZGQW, JYL, ZDQY, PJQY, ZGQY, HPMQY, PJFS, ZDFS, JDFS, ZDFSFX, JDFSFX, ZXXDSD, PJXDSD, SQY from QXSJB where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
select ID, SZSF, JCDBH, ZDMC, ZDZB, SCSJ, ZDQW, PJQW, ZGQW, JYL, ZDQY, PJQY, ZGQY, HPMQY, PJFS, ZDFS, JDFS, ZDFSFX, JDFSFX, ZXXDSD, PJXDSD, SQY from QXSJB
